text: bayehachewimi gīzē ākalochachewi (gizufinetachewi) yasidenik’uhali፡፡ bīnagerumi lenigigirachewi tadamit’alehi፤ (ke‘iwik’eti bado bemeẖoni)፡፡ inerisu liki begidigida yetet’egu ginidochini yimesilalu፡፡ ch’uẖetini hulu be’inerisu layi newi bilewi yasibalu፡፡ inerisu t’elatochi nachewina tet’enik’ek’achewi፡፡ ālahi yigadelachewi፤ (ke’imineti) inidēti yimelesalu
